amendment.description: To provide project-based housing assistance to repair housing damaged as a result of Hurricane Katrina and other hurricanes of the 2005 hurricane season.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3753 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3753 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S4008; text: CR S4008) To provide project-based housing assistance to repair housing damaged as a result of Hurricane Katrina and other hurricanes of the 2005 hurricane season.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3753 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3753 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Landrieu.
